nodes.text: The Brema sector, known as the Sullust sector during the era of the Cold War, was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories near the border of the Mid Rim, that included the planets Bortras, Callos, Cmaoli Di, Kerig'En, Ord Ibanna, Ord Simres, Tuerto, and the worlds of the Sullust system; Sullumun, Sullust, and Lununmo.
During the Galactic Civil War, the sector was governed by Moff Malcom. Pinacism swept through the sector despite the efforts of Malcom to halt it.
